    G

    Game - Class in model.game
    Represents the main Jest card game engine and orchestrator.
    Game() - Constructor for class model.game.Game
    Constructs a new Game with default settings.
    Game(boolean) - Constructor for class model.game.Game
    Constructs a new Game with optional expansion cards.
    Game(boolean, GameVariant) - Constructor for class model.game.Game
    Constructs a new Game with expansion selection and specific variant.
    GameSaver - Class in util
    Provides utility methods for saving, loading, and managing Jest game saves.
    GameSaver() - Constructor for class util.GameSaver
     
    GameState - Class in model.game
